summary: This mod gives the player the ability to summon legendary companion Ysgramor.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. Well, skyrim mod, that is. So the name says it all, it adds a summonable Ysgramor to the game.

Location of Mod:
There are 3 spell tome books in-game. The first one is located in Kodlak Whitemane's quarters in Jorrvaskr, and probably the fastest way to get one. The second one is located in the Arcanaeum at the College of Winterhold, on the desk. The third, and final, book is located in Ysgramor's tomb (name sound's familiar.....), in a chest. 

NOTE: this mod is still a work in progress. If you have any suggestions on how to make this mod better, or have ideas for other spell-related (or just random) mods, leave a comment. 

There is also a steam version of the mod. it's under the same name in the "Magic" category.
author: Alex
